scripts.kill: lsof -i:8081 | awk 'NR!=1 {print $2}' | xargs kill && lsof -i:2600 | awk 'NR!=1 {print $2}' | xargs kill
scripts.basic-tests: kompot -b KompotExample -l kompotGlobalMocks.js  && detox test -c ios.sim.debug -s KompotTests
scripts.custom-root-test: kompot -b KompotExample -i kompotCustomRoot  && detox test -c ios.sim.debug -s CustomRootTest
scripts.test: npm run detox-build && npm run test-all
scripts.test-all: npm run kill && kompot -sr & npm run basic-tests && npm run custom-root-test && npm run kill
